### Description

[The `cudnn` spec](https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cudnn/package.py
) should be updated to add version `8.2.2` wich supports Cuda 11.4. This is an issue because 11.4 is now the default cuda version. See the [cudnn support mattrix](https://docs.nvidia.com/deeplearning/cudnn/support-matrix/index.html).

I had some conflicts trying to install `py-cupy` due to that.
Thanks for the support

@adamjstewart  @bvanessen
title: Add cudnn version 8.2.2 (Cuda 11.4)
